title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing divorce in a dream according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Seeing a divorce in a dream may indicate changes and developments in the dreamer’s life, and it may indicate a collapse of anxiety and anxiety, and seeing a divorce for a person indicates a new life, and divorce may mean that the man will do so. People were left confused by the cases in which the husband did not divorce, despite the husband’s verbal statements. Interpretation of a dream about divorce in Al-Osaimi’s dream and seeing divorce shows many signs, some of which are good and in other places bad. Ending divorce and separation. Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about divorce. A guide to getting rid of all problems and fears. If a patient dreams that he is divorcing his wife, this means that the patient will recover soon. A dream about divorce indicates that the situation has improved. Seeing a girl’s divorce in a dream proves that Her situation will improve. See also: Interpretation of a dream about divorce by Ibn Sirin and Al-AsimiInterpretation of a dream about divorce for a single womanDream pointsDivorceIn a dream, an unmarried girl indicates that she is about to get married. If she sees divorce in her dream and she is satisfied, this means that she will hear good news. It usually represents seeing divorce in The dream of an unmarried girl means sadness and problems. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of divorce in a dream for the married Al-Usaimi who - who dreams: The married woman divorces her husband in her dream and this vision shows the end of worries and problems and the repayment of debts. If she finds that she is divorcing her husband, this means that Her life has changed positively. Divorce usually indicates a stable marital life. Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a pregnant woman’s dream: A dream about divorce indicates the approaching date of childbirth. If a pregnant divorced woman is at home, it means the birth of a boy. As for seeing a divorce while she is happy, this indicates that her fetus is fine. See Also: Interpretation of a dream to see a refusal to marry or engage in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream for a man. If an unmarried young man sees divorce in his dream, this means that he will marry a beautiful girl. For a married man who sees divorce in his dream, this indicates that he or his wife is unemployed. A man’s dream of divorcing his wife indicates happiness and kindness. Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream: If a sick person sees that he has divorced his wife, this indicates his recovery from the disease. Seeing divorce in a dream indicates the fall of worry and worry and relief from sorrows. Seeing a friend or girlfriend divorcing in a dream indicates Changes and developments for the better. Seeing a girl divorcing while she is happy indicates good news. Seeing a divorce for a man may mean leaving work or joining another job. Seeing a wife divorcing her husband means getting rid of worry and worry.

title: Ibn Sirin's most important interpretations of seeing God in a dream

preview.html: Seeing God in a dream: This vision carries many meanings and connotations, some of which are good and others serve as a signal or warning to the dreamer, and the interpretation varies from one person to another depending on the condition of the dreamer and the details of the vision. Interpretive scholars.Seeing God in a dreamSeeing God in a dream has many interpretations and means that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money and livelihood in the coming period, because God alone has His hand in sustenance, in the event that you want a specific thing in life and work hard for it to achieve it and you saw it in a dream this The vision shows that you will achieve everything you want and that God will answer your call. Seeing God in a dream may be just an imagination and a whisper of Satan, and when one wakes up, one should immediately forget him and put him out of his mind. In fact, he is a scientist. This means that he is corrupt and that God will not accept a supplication from him, and this interpretation is in the event that one sees God in another form. Seeing God in a dream by Ibn SirinAccording to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, if one sees God in a dream and he is in reality righteous, this means that God accepts from him all What he does and the experiences that will negatively affect his life, but in the end he will be closer to him. God and God will forgive him for everything he has done. When one sees in a dream that God has given him a certain blessing, it means and indicates that he has many good deeds, and the person does not leave what he does, it means that he will not obtain wealth or livelihood in this world And the afterlife. This specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet on Google. Seeing God in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl sees God in her dream and in reality she is suffering from a physical and psychological crisis and she is an honest and loyal girl to God, but this crisis is so bigger than her that she cannot overcome or solve it. This is evidence that she will soon be freed from this pain and that God Almighty will respond to the supplications. The vision also indicates that the girl’s condition will change for the better. If the girl sees that she is praying in her dream and during prayer she sees God, this means that her faith is strong and that she is close to God, and the vision shows Achieving desires and goals and they will succeed in them. Life.If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that God is giving her money, this means that she will be happy in her life and that in the coming period she will meet a person who will marry her and truly love her, and this person will also be soon. To God and fear Him. Seeing God in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman, if she sees God in a dream and in reality she is forced to live with her husband and does not love him, even though the husband is close to God and loves her and offers her love, respect, affection and mercy, but does she not want to live and stay with him, then this vision Evidence that this woman must protect her home and her husband, who loves her and will not leave him. This vision also symbolizes goodness and means that her children will be among the outstanding and achieve many successes in their lives. Seeing a married woman in his dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase Stairs or ladders are the means that help people move from one floor to another in different buildings, the world of dreams or not? We will learn this in the following lines of the article. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase. Jurists mentioned many interpretations of seeing broken stairs in a dream, the most important of which are the following: Whoever dreams of a broken staircase, this indicates the death of a loved one or the illness of a person known to him. Seeing a broken staircase in a dream indicates A woman who cannot achieve her goals in life or fulfill her desires. The dream of a broken staircase also indicates the amount of debt that the dreamer has and the financial crises that he faces in his life. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - says that whoever sees a broken staircase in a dream leads to many difficulties and obstacles that he will suffer from in his life. A dream about a broken staircase also indicates a feeling of anguish, extreme distress, and the extent of sadness. In which the dreamer lives. And if a person sees during his sleep that the ladder is broken, this indicates his inability to achieve his dreams and his great sense of failure. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees that she is climbing a broken ladder in her dream, this indicates the many problems that she will face in the future. In the coming days, the dream may symbolize for her that she will commit forbidden and sins that anger God Almighty. If the girl is a student and sees a broken ladder in her dream, this indicates that she failed in her studies and got very bad grades. When an unmarried woman dreams of climbing a broken ladder with her lover, this leads to To separation and separation between them. If a girl sees her friend climbing broken stairs, this is a warning to stay away from her because she is a handicap. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase for a married woman: Seeing a broken house staircase in a married woman’s dream leads to many disagreements and problems that disrupt her life and may lead to divorce, and the dream also indicates She will be exposed to serious financial difficulties in the coming period. If a married woman sees in her dream that her children are climbing a broken staircase, this is a sign that they are taking the wrong path. When a woman dreams of her husband climbing a broken staircase, this is a sign that he has betrayed her and committed many sins, and she must advise and guide him. To the right path. If a married woman is working and sees her work staircase cut down in her dream, this symbolizes the presence of dilemmas in her work. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman seeing in her dream that the staircase is cut down proves that she will face many financial and health crises during pregnancy. If she dreams A pregnant woman is climbing a broken ladder in the first months, as this is a sign that she will soon lose her fetus. A pregnant woman’s dream of a broken staircase also indicates that she will give birth to a nervous and rebellious baby girl or girl, who will suffer a lot in raising her.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing torture in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of the dream of seeing torture in a dream Ibn Sirin Torture is a means of punishment or harm and has many forms, and seeing torture in a dream has many interpretations that differ depending on the situation and the thing being tortured, and in this article we will explain to you all the forms of torture that you see in a dream and their interpretation. Interpretation of a dream Torture by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing torture in a dream as indicating the problems and difficulties that the dreamer is suffering from. Whoever sees the torture of others in a dream, this indicates cruelty, injustice, and confusion. Seeing torture in a dream has another positive aspect because it can indicate adventure, ambition, and love. He sees in a dream? He tortures himself by stripping himself of his skin. It is related to marrying a good woman. And the immoral person who sees in a dream that he is taking off his clothes, this is a sign of death. And whoever sees in a dream that he is dissecting his body, this dream indicates a lack of money. And whoever sees in a dream that he is using a saw And he extends his body, this is evidence that God will bless him with a male child. Interpretation of seeing torture in a woman’s dream A woman who sees torture in a dream shows her bad psychological state. Seeing an unmarried woman being tortured in a dream could be a sign of separation from her lover. A married woman who sees torture In a dream, this indicates the ill-treatment with which her husband treats her. And the wife. For a pregnant woman who sees torture in a dream, this indicates the extent of pain and fatigue. The place in which you live during pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a vision of torture for the dead. Anyone who dreams of a dead person being tortured with fire, then this dream portends With a bad ending. Whoever sees death other than fire, this dream indicates the torment of the grave. And whoever sees the tormentor dead in a dream, this could be a message to the dreamer about the need to give charity to the deceased. Interpretation of a vision of torturing a prisoner. Whoever dreams of being imprisoned and tortured, this indicates that he will fall into trouble and trouble. Seeing a prisoner being tortured indicates a great trial that will fall upon the dreamer. Whoever dreams of being tortured by fire in prison, this indicates repentance for sins. The torture of beating indicates failure and oppression in his life. Interpretation of seeing tortured children in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that a child is suffering in a dream, this It indicates failure in the field of study or failure in a love relationship. There are those who interpreted the vision of tortured children in a dream, in relation to repentance of sins and disobedience. Whoever sees in a dream a child being tortured and hearing his screams in the dream, this indicates losses everywhere in a drink under his management. Seeing children being tortured in a dream may be the extent of the need to get married and have children. Therefore, we present to you all possible interpretations of seeing torture in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the explanation as quickly as possible.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing bricks in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of seeing bricks in a dream has many meanings and repercussions, because bricks are used in construction and can be found in this article and they are the basic elements for constructing any building whether it is a home or a company without bricks. . It is impossible to start any real estate or business. Some apartments and houses are sent with red bricks before they are completed, because whoever dreams of knowing whether she is pregnant, single, or married, bricks can be interpreted in a dream, as there are good signs, and others are bad. Interpretation of a dream about dreaming about bricks, meaning red bricks in the dreams of ordinary women, Dreams of married women, pregnant women, and men, seeing moving bricks, the meaning of bricks falling from the sky, falling bricks, dream symbol, rotting bricks, bricks, a solid, rectangular material made of clay that is resistant to environmental factors and can be used for construction purposes. When you see clay bricks or cement bricks in a dream, it must be It has many interpretations and meanings, which we will solve by explaining bricks in a dream. Interpretation of seeing bricks in a dream. Dreaming about a brick in a dream proves that a serious and strong-willed person can work successfully and achieve profits and gains. Seeing red bricks in a dream may mean that the Prophet faces some obstacles and difficulties in His life, but he will overcome them all. I dream of a brick house in my dream. This indicates that the people of this house had a lot of kindness, food and financial blessings. Seeing a brick building in a dream is a symbol of hard work and patience in fulfilling desires and ambitions and achieving desired goals. Dreaming of throwing red bricks in a dream is undesirable, because it shows stupidity And gossip, and talks about people’s hypocrisy and distorts the lives of others. Continue: Interpretation of Al-Osaimi’s dream about clayInterpretation of a dream about bricks for the eyesExplain that seeing a white brick in a woman’s dream means that the dates of her engagement and marriage are approaching a suitable, affectionate and loving person. Dreaming about poor women indicates that they are in a bad state of mind Because of the failure of some things, they feel anxious and depressed. Seeing a brick of milk in a woman’s dream shows the weakness of her character and the strength of her will, because she believes in many lies and illusions. Seeing a dream of throwing bricks and stones in a stubborn woman’s dreams proves that she has many enemies and their victory over her, and many are talking about it. Wrong.For poor women, making a brick in a dream and collecting it in a dream indicates that she will successfully achieve what she wants and desires in her life, whether professionally or personally.Interpretation of seeing bricks for married womenThe interpretation of dreams and dreams for a married woman explains the strength of this relationship between her husband and her family and her intense interest With children and family. Seeing a brick that a married woman fell from the sky in her dream means that many problems and disasters will be solved in the coming period. Dreaming of white bricks in a dream for a married woman proves the abundance of money and wealth, the prosperity of life, good luck, and the fulfillment of desires and aspirations. Seeing a married woman picking up a brick in a dream shows her extreme patience

title: Interpretation of seeing butter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing butter in a dream. It is one of the visions that has many praiseworthy expressions, including the fulfillment of desires and goals and the removal of worries and problems, as it portends a young man about marriage. We will learn in detail about this vision for a single man, a girl, and a married woman for different scenes such as seeing white butter or seeing buying butter, But before starting to present the different visions and their interpretations, it is important to emphasize that it is not correct to reject any interpretation that we will provide for any other vision without consulting a scientist who specializes in the interpretation of dreams, because the interpretation of a dream does not depend only on the presence of similarities between the visions, but there are many factors. To interpret dreams. Read also: The toilet in a dream. The interpretation of butter in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing butter in a dream. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that butter in a dream has many indications that herald the improvement of the dreamer’s conditions - God willing. Just like butter in a dream, Ibn Sirin believes that it symbolizes Halal money, or a sick person who sees butter in a dream, this indicates recovery - God willing - soon. As for someone who sees spoiled butter in a dream, this is a warning message to the dreamer that he may fail, God forbid. In addition to seeing melted butter in a dream, this may indicate There are many obstacles and problems facing the dreamer. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Seeing butter in a single woman’s dream. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is eating butter, this indicates the love and happiness that the girl enjoys, and this dream may herald marriage, and God knows best. Buying butter in A dream for an unmarried girl indicates that she is happy with her family and also shows the girl’s ability to achieve the goals and aspirations that she seeks. As for a girl who sees yellow butter in a dream, this may indicate the problems and crises that she is suffering from, and God knows best. Seeing butter in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees Butter in a dream may be a sign of her imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Just like a married woman in a dream eating butter, this could indicate halal money and also indicates the peaceful life that this woman enjoys. Whether buying butter in a married woman’s dream, it may be This is based on the human belief that she will be able to achieve her dreams during the coming period - God willing -. title: The most important interpretations of a dream about makeup for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman: Girls and women love to decorate themselves with cosmetics that give a beautiful shine to the woman and make her feel happy because it gives her a sense of psychological comfort. In some cases, makeup is used to hide some skin imperfections. If she sees herself using it in a vision, does this indicate happiness or the opposite? We present the meanings of seeing makeup in our article, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman Sometimes a woman sees that her husband gives her a box of cosmetics, even if she is happy with this dream. It is a beautiful sign of mutual trust between them and the husband’s desire to please her and make her happy in her relationship with him. The love between them is great and she can quickly understand what she needs if she wants something and does not interfere. They suffer from family problems but only within physical limits. It can be said that using a little makeup in a dream A woman is a sign of her good personality and beauty, while wearing a lot of makeup inappropriately does not express that. It symbolizes her fear and inability to make many decisions in life, because she has a weak personality in her self-confidence and is afraid to make one decision and then get into trouble. After that, she turns to her husband or a family member to help her with this. This topic.Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. One of the meanings of wearing makeup for a married woman in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is that it is evidence of her striving from time to time not to reveal her secrets to those around her, especially her husband, and that she can talk. To a member of her family or friends, but she cannot do so with her husband because of the dispute between them or her fear of responding. Do it for her. If the woman is newly married and sees the condition of cosmetics on her face and she appears attractive and gorgeous, then the meaning of the dream confirms her extensive love for her husband and her desire to always see her beautiful and special, and so she tries to gain his trust and do things that make him happy to always stay close to him and happy with him. Dream Interpretation Site Asrar is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a pregnant woman. Experts point out that the meaning of makeup in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she is happy with her pregnancy and is preparing to welcome her little child with great joy, but at the same time she may be very worried about Its shape and weight. After pregnancy and the many changes that accompany her body from the makeup during the dream. But if the makeup she wears is a bit natural and makes her look better and more special, then it can be said that she is a little tired because of the pregnancy, but her pain will quickly disappear and she will get rid of it. Of the tiring days you spend. Explanation: If you wear excessive makeup because it confirms the birth of a girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman. Makeup in a married woman’s dream is considered a sign of confidence and self-love, if she gives a simple aesthetic touch to her face and does not exaggerate this.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of another: Death is one of the things that causes panic and anxiety for many people. As for dreams, do their connotations indicate good or evil? Through our article, we will explain the most important interpretations and concepts so that the dreamer will not be too distracted by the indicators and thus his heart will be reassured in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother. Many leading interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing the death of a brother in a dream is a promising vision that indicates positive transformations and changes in the life of the dreamer and that God will fill all his coming days with joy and happiness. The interpretation of the death of a brother in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will be able to get rid of all the envious people in his life to a great extent and they want him bad and bad, but in the event that the owner of the dream suffered from many successive health diseases in reality and saw in his dream the death His brother, this is a sign that God will heal him soon. Interpretation of the dream of the death of a brother by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the death of a brother in a dream is one of the dreams that reassures the heart, and that he promises the dreamer that he will be able to get rid of people who planned great disasters and intrigues. Because it fell inside him and he could not get out of it, but the opposite happened. The scholar Ibn Sirin also said that seeing the death of a brother and seeing all the burial and funeral rituals in the dream indicates that the dreamer is a pious man, dedicated to all matters of his religion and takes God into account. Any action or action comes from him so that it does not affect his position with his Lord. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that if a man sees the death of his brother during his sleep, this is a sign of the end of all family disputes that affected his soul and his future in previous periods. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a website specialized in Interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about the death of an unmarried brother. If an unmarried woman sees the death of her brother in her dream and suffers from many health crises in reality, this indicates that she will get rid of all health problems. Soon, God willing. While if a girl sees the death of her older brother in her dream, this is a sign that she will go through many difficult crises that will make her exposed to great harm in the coming periods. However, if an unmarried woman suffers from bouts of worsening her health and sees in her dream that she is kissing her deceased brother, then this It indicates a significant deterioration in her condition, which leads to her approaching death, and God knows best on that day. Marriage means getting close to a person who has many distinctive qualities. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother for a married woman. If a married woman sees the death of her brother in a dream, this is a sign that she will hear a lot of good news about her personal life that will rejoice her heart in the coming days, God willing. However, if the woman sees that. The death of her husband and brother during her sleep is a sign that God will bless her with children in the coming periods. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother for a pregnant woman: Seeing the death of a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence that God will shower her life and her family with many blessings and gifts, and the death of a brother is also in a woman’s dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a dream about Al-Osaimi

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of dreams about flowers in a dream Al-Osaimi A dream about flowers indicates many situations that the viewer goes through, because flowers contain a pleasant smell and make a person in a state of healing, and because flowers are among the things that everyone prefers, and seeing them in a dream are good indicators, and this is what Al-Osaimi explained in Its interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a dream about Al-Asami. Interpretation of dreams. Flowers in a dream indicate happiness and joy if they are white. Dreaming about yellow flowers in a dream is a sign of optimism, but if the flowers are damaged, this indicates a disease that the dreamer is suffering from. Blue flowers in a dream are evidence of security and stability. As for dreaming of flowers on trees in a dream, it is a sign of kindness and good offspring. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a dream. Seeing a dream about flowers. Beautiful colors are evidence of happy news and abundant nourishment that this girl will receive in the near future. But if the girl sees if he buys flowers in a dream, this indicates Until the next marriage date. A girl’s dream of red flowers is a sign of happiness and marriage to a young man she loves. Interpretation of a dream of flowers in a married woman’s dream by Al-Asami. Interpretation of a dream of flowers for a married woman in a dream is evidence of sadness if they are black. Seeing jasmine flowers in a dream is a sign of achieving goals and recovery. Of diseases. Red flowers show stability in married life. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing flowers in a dream for a woman. Pregnancy is evidence of easy birth. If he sees a flower, this indicates the birth of a female. To dream that you are buying flowers means that you will hear good news. If she sees Flowers cut from trees in a dream, this is a sign of tension and sadness that will happen to her in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about flowers in a man’s dream If a person sees in a dream that he is picking flowers, this means that he will face some problems. Picking flowers suggests strength and status. As for the single person who sees Flowers in a dream are evidence of his relationship with a girl he longed for. Add the dream you want to interpret with reference to the family situation in a comment below the article and we will answer it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a fox in a dream: Seeing a fox in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The meaning of the fox, whether brown, white, white, black, or small. I dreamed of being chased, pursued, slaughtered, escaping, or biting a single girl, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, more about Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the fox in your dream by Ibn Sirin. In a dream, a man abandoned fraud and a lot of deception. In his religion and worldly life, whoever sees a fox avoiding him is an opponent who will avoid him. Whoever sees that he is arguing with one of the fox’s relatives, if the fox’s request has caused him pain from the husbands, and if the fox asks him, he is afraid, and the fox has caused weakness in the one he loves. Humiliation and a decrease in his wealth. The fox was called an astrologer or doctor, and it was said that whoever saw that he touched a fox, the jinn would be frightened by it and eat. Its flesh is a disease that recovers quickly, and the fox defeats an opponent or competitor. And whoever sees that he is playing with the fox, he will be blessed with a woman whom he loves and who loves him. On the authority of a man who came to Abu Bakr Al-Siddiq, may God be pleased with him, and said: I saw myself raining on a fox, and he said to him: You are a liar and the man is a poet. A man came to Ibn Sirin He said: I saw that I would reward the fox with the best reward. The Magi said: Al-Dahhaq saw the area between the East and the West full of foxes, as if he were a shepherd, and he conveyed his vision in Surah. Ibn Shaheen’s dream of a fox is interpreted by a cunning, deceitful man with deception or a lying maid from his relatives. Whoever dreams that he is fighting a fox, this indicates A dispute with his family and relatives. Whoever dreams that he is searching for a fox shows fear of jeans. Whoever dreams that he is playing with a fox and wants to catch it, this indicates the woman’s love for her and the weakness of his love for her. Whoever sees a fox flattering him, it shows a strange and deceitful act. Whoever dreams of releasing a fox, this indicates that the person is deceiving him. And whoever sees his skin means that money will be deceived, and whoever dreams that he drinks his milk, it indicates his health from his illness if he is sick, and if he drowns, he will be happy, and if he is in prison he will be released, and it is said that he is suffering from a severe illness or panic. And whoever sees There is a fox in his house, so it indicates that he will marry the one he loves. Whoever dreams of a fox escaping from him, then it indicates the fulfillment of his religion. It was said: The fox is a liar and an enemy. So whoever sees a fox abusing his wife, then his wife has committed adultery. And whoever sees that he is treating the fox will argue. It was said: Whoever dreams of touching a fox will be struck by a wind, and whoever sees that the fox is caressing him, the genie will frighten him. It was said: Whoever dreams that he has taken a fox for himself, then he defiles a woman whom his eye consoles. Anyone who sees a fox running towards him is interpreted as avoiding his opponent. Al-Nabulsi dreams of a fox. In a dream, he is an enemy, a fighter, a liar, an enemy, he avoids in his dealings, and whoever fights him or touches him is terrified. From the jinn. Religion, because the fox infects a woman he loves and loves, and God Almighty recognizes his eye with her, and the fox is interpreted by astrologers, doctors, people of contemplation, and hatred. And whoever sees a fox, he has seen an honorable man, or an honorable or dear woman, or a man who is flattered by deceit, so the fox appears as an unknown, cunning enemy. Very, and then he does his job, so he seems deceitful. Women. Whoever dreams of avoiding a fox is a lying poet, and likewise whoever sees that he is rewarding the fox with the best punishment. Whoever sees that between the East and West is full of foxes, sorcery and deception abound at that time. And whoever sees that he is arguing with a fox, or treating her, then he will...
